languages.text: "Именем Бога-Императора, династия фон Валанциус обвиняется в предательстве Империума". {n}Под всеобщий ропот префект берет в руки свиток с печатями Администратума.{/n} "Данное заседание имеет публичный характер, дабы каждый узрел ереси Вольного Торговца и осознал — никакой статус и власть не защитят от праведной кары. Маршал Стракс, вам слово. Огласите список разбираемых преступлений против {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Лекс Империалис{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "Слушается дело о признании династии фон Валанциус еретиками и предателями Империума". {n}Под всеобщий ропот префект берет в руки свиток с печатями Администратума.{/n} "Данное заседание проводится вне стандартных регламентов в связи с чрезвычайным положением обвиняемого. Процесс публичный, дабы никто не посмел усомниться в справедливости обвинений и приговора. Маршал Стракс, вам слово. Огласите список разбираемых преступлений против {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Лекс Империалис{/g}".
traits.speaker: VP_Prefect

languages.text: "In the name of the God-Emperor, the von Valancius dynasty stands accused of betraying the Imperium." {n}To the murmurs of all, the prefect picks up a scroll bearing Administratum seals.{/n} "The trial is public so that all may see the Rogue Trader's heresies and know that status and power are no shield against righteous punishment. Marshal Strachs, you have the floor. State the list of crimes against the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g} that will be examined here today."
languages.original_text: "Именем Бога-Императора, династия фон Валанциус обвиняется в предательстве Империума". {n}Под всеобщий ропот префект берет в руки свиток с печатями Администратума.{/n} "Данное заседание имеет публичный характер, дабы каждый узрел ереси Вольного Торговца и осознал — никакой статус и власть не защитят от праведной кары. Маршал Стракс, вам слово. Огласите список разбираемых преступлений против {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Лекс Империалис{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "In the name of the God-Emperor, the von Valancius dynasty stands accused of betraying the Imperium." {n}To the murmurs of all, the prefect picks up a scroll bearing Administratum seals.{/n} "The trial is public so that all may see the Rogue Trader's heresies and know that status and power are no shield against righteous punishment. Marshal Strachs, you have the floor. State the list of crimes against the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g} that will be examined here today."

"In the name of the God-Emperor, the von Valancius dynasty stands accused of betraying the Imperium." {n}To the murmurs of all, the prefect picks up a scroll bearing the seals of the Administratum.{/n} "The trial is public so that all may see the Rogue Trader's heresies and know that status and power are no shield against righteous punishment. Marshal Strachs, you have the floor. State the list of crimes against the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g} that will be examined here today."

"The court will now hear the case to declare the von Valancius dynasty heretics and traitors against the Imperium." {n}To the murmurs of all, the prefect picks up a scroll bearing Administratum seals.{/n} "This hearing is being held outside of standard regulations due to the exceptional status of the accused. The trial is public so that none will dare to question the fairness of the charges and the verdict. Marshal Strachs, you have the floor. State the list of crimes against the Lex Imperialis that will be examined here today."

"In the name of the God-Emperor, the von Valancius dynasty stands accused of betraying the Imperium." {n}To the murmurs of all, the prefect picks up a scroll bearing Administratum seals.{/n} "The trial is public so that all may see the Rogue Trader's heresies and know that status and power are no shield against righteous punishment. Marshal Strachs, you have the floor. State the list of crimes against the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g} that will be examined here today."

"In the name of the God-Emperor, the von Valancius dynasty stands accused of betraying the Imperium." {n}To the murmurs of all, the prefect picks up a scroll bearing Administratum seals.{/n} "The trial is public so that all may see the Rogue Trader's heresies and know that status and power are no shield against righteous punishment. Marshal Strachs, you have the floor. State the list of crimes against the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g} that will be examined here today."

"In the name of the God-Emperor, the von Valancius dynasty stands accused of betraying the Imperium." {n}To the murmurs of all, the prefect picks up a scroll bearing Administratum seals.{/n} "The trial is public so that all may see the Rogue Trader's heresies and know that status and power are no shield against righteous punishment. Marshal Strachs, you have the floor. State the list of crimes against the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g} that will be examined here today."

"In the name of the God-Emperor, the von Valancius dynasty stands accused of betraying the Imperium." {n}To the murmurs of all, the prefect picks up a scroll bearing the seals of the Administratum.{/n} "The trial is public so that all may see the Rogue Trader's heresies and know that status and power are no shield against righteous punishment. Marshal Strachs, you have the floor. State the list of crimes against the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g} that will be examined here today."

languages.text: "Im Namen des Gottimperators wird der Dynastie derer von Valancius vorgeworfen, das Imperium verraten zu haben." {n}Begleitet vom Murmeln der Anwesenden greift die Präfektin nach einer Schriftrolle mit den Siegeln des Administratums.{/n} "Die Verhandlung ist öffentlich, damit alle die Ketzereien {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} sehen können und erkennen, dass Status und Macht nicht vor rechtschaffener Strafe schützen. Marschall Strachs, Ihr habt das Wort. Nennt die Verbrechen gegen das {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperia{/g}, die hier und heute verhandelt werden."
languages.original_text: "In the name of the God-Emperor, the von Valancius dynasty stands accused of betraying the Imperium." {n}To the murmurs of all, the prefect picks up a scroll bearing Administratum seals.{/n} "The trial is public so that all may see the Rogue Trader's heresies and know that status and power are no shield against righteous punishment. Marshal Strachs, you have the floor. State the list of crimes against the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g} that will be examined here today."

traits.locale_text: "Im Namen des Gottimperators wird der Dynastie derer von Valancius vorgeworfen, das Imperium verraten zu haben." {n}Begleitet vom Murmeln der Anwesenden greift die Präfektin nach einer Schriftrolle mit den Siegeln des Administratums.{/n} "Die Verhandlung ist öffentlich, damit alle die Ketzereien {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} sehen können und erkennen, dass Status und Macht nicht vor rechtschaffener Strafe schützen. Marschall Strachs, Ihr habt das Wort. Nennt die Verbrechen gegen das {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperia{/g}, die hier und heute verhandelt werden."

"Das Gericht befasst sich nun mit dem Vorwurf der Häresie und des Verrats am Imperium gegen die Dynastie derer von Valancius." {n}Begleitet vom Murmeln der Anwesenden greift die Präfektin nach einer Schriftrolle mit den Siegeln des Administratums.{/n} "Diese Anhörung erfolgt aufgrund des außerordentlichen Status {mf|des|der} Beschuldigten außerhalb der üblichen Regularien. Die Verhandlung ist öffentlich, damit niemand die Gerechtigkeit der Anklagepunkte und des Urteils infrage stellen kann. Marschall Strachs, Ihr habt das Wort. Nennt die Verbrechen gegen das Lex Imperia, die hier und heute verhandelt werden."

languages.text: « Au nom de l'Empereur-Dieu, la dynastie von Valancius est accusée de trahison à l'encontre de l'Imperium. » {n}La préfète se saisit d'un parchemin portant les sceaux de l'Administratum tandis que des murmures parcourent l'assemblée.{/n} « Ce procès se déroule en public afin d'exposer les hérésies {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} aux yeux de tous et ainsi prouver que le statut et le pouvoir n'entravent en rien l'application d'un juste châtiment. Maréchal Strachs, vous avez la parole. Énoncez la liste des crimes commis contre la {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g} qui seront examinés aujourd'hui. »
languages.original_text: "In the name of the God-Emperor, the von Valancius dynasty stands accused of betraying the Imperium." {n}To the murmurs of all, the prefect picks up a scroll bearing Administratum seals.{/n} "The trial is public so that all may see the Rogue Trader's heresies and know that status and power are no shield against righteous punishment. Marshal Strachs, you have the floor. State the list of crimes against the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g} that will be examined here today."

traits.locale_text: « Au nom de l'Empereur-Dieu, la dynastie von Valancius est accusée de trahison à l'encontre de l'Imperium. » {n}La préfète se saisit d'un parchemin portant les sceaux de l'Administratum tandis que des murmures parcourent l'assemblée.{/n} « Ce procès se déroule en public afin d'exposer les hérésies {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} aux yeux de tous et ainsi prouver que le statut et le pouvoir n'entravent en rien l'application d'un juste châtiment. Maréchal Strachs, vous avez la parole. Énoncez la liste des crimes commis contre la {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g} qui seront examinés aujourd'hui. »

« La cour va maintenant statuer sur la procédure visant à frapper la dynastie von Valancius d'hérésie et la déclarer traîtresse à l'Imperium. {n}La préfète se saisit d'un parchemin portant les sceaux de l'Administratum tandis que des murmures parcourent l'assemblée.{/n} En raison du statut hors norme de l'{mf|accusé|accusée}, cette audience se déroulera selon une procédure exceptionnelle. Il a également été décidé que ce procès se tiendrait publiquement afin que nul n'ose contester l'équité des charges retenues ou l'impartialité du jugement rendu. Maréchal Strachs, vous avez la parole. Énoncez la liste des crimes commis contre la Lex Imperialis qui seront examinés aujourd'hui. »

languages.text: “以神皇的名义，本法庭在此指控冯·瓦兰修斯王朝犯下了背叛帝国的罪行。”{n}在一片窃窃私语声中，行政官拿起了带有帝国内政部印章的卷宗。{/n}“本次审判完全公开，所有参与人员都可以亲眼看到行商浪人犯下的异端恶行。希望所有人能引以为戒：无论是地位还是权力，都无法阻挡正义的惩罚。斯塔克斯元帅，现在由你来进行发言。被告违背了{g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}帝国法典{/g}众多法律条款，请陈述今天需要审理的罪行清单。”
languages.original_text: "In the name of the God-Emperor, the von Valancius dynasty stands accused of betraying the Imperium." {n}To the murmurs of all, the prefect picks up a scroll bearing Administratum seals.{/n} "The trial is public so that all may see the Rogue Trader's heresies and know that status and power are no shield against righteous punishment. Marshal Strachs, you have the floor. State the list of crimes against the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g} that will be examined here today."

traits.locale_text: “以神皇的名义，本法庭在此指控冯·瓦兰修斯王朝犯下了背叛帝国的罪行。”{n}在一片窃窃私语声中，行政官拿起了带有帝国内政部印章的卷宗。{/n}“本次审判完全公开，所有参与人员都可以亲眼看到行商浪人犯下的异端恶行。希望所有人能引以为戒：无论是地位还是权力，都无法阻挡正义的惩罚。斯塔克斯元帅，现在由你来进行发言。被告违背了{g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}帝国法典{/g}众多法律条款，请陈述今天需要审理的罪行清单。”
“本法庭将即刻审理冯·瓦兰修斯王朝针对帝国的异端、叛国罪行。”{n}在一片窃窃私语声中，行政官拿起了带有帝国内政部印章的卷宗。{/n}“由于被告人的特殊身份，本次听证会将不再按照标准规程举行。本次审判全程公开，因此不会有任何人质疑指控与判决的公正性。斯塔克斯元帅，现在由你来进行发言。被告违背了帝国众多法律条款，请陈述今天需要审理的罪行清单。”

languages.text: «En nombre del Dios Emperador, se acusa a la dinastía von Valancius de traicionar al Imperium». {n}Ante los murmullos generalizados, la prefecta coge un pergamino con sellos del Administratum.{/n} «Este juicio se celebra públicamente para que todos sean testigos de las herejías perpetradas por {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente y sepan que ni el poder ni la condición social protegen de un justo y merecido castigo. Mariscal Strachs, puede comenzar. Liste los delitos contra la {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g} que examinaremos aquí hoy».
languages.original_text: "In the name of the God-Emperor, the von Valancius dynasty stands accused of betraying the Imperium." {n}To the murmurs of all, the prefect picks up a scroll bearing Administratum seals.{/n} "The trial is public so that all may see the Rogue Trader's heresies and know that status and power are no shield against righteous punishment. Marshal Strachs, you have the floor. State the list of crimes against the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g} that will be examined here today."

traits.locale_text: «En nombre del Dios Emperador, se acusa a la dinastía von Valancius de traicionar al Imperium». {n}Ante los murmullos generalizados, la prefecta coge un pergamino con sellos del Administratum.{/n} «Este juicio se celebra públicamente para que todos sean testigos de las herejías perpetradas por {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente y sepan que ni el poder ni la condición social protegen de un justo y merecido castigo. Mariscal Strachs, puede comenzar. Liste los delitos contra la {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g} que examinaremos aquí hoy».

«El tribunal juzgará ahora el caso para declarar herética y traidora al Imperium a la dinastía von Valancius». {n}Ante los murmullos generalizados, la prefecta coge un pergamino con sellos del Administratum.{/n} «Esta audiencia tiene lugar fuera de las regulaciones habituales debido a la posición excepcional de la defensa. El juicio es público para que nadie pueda cuestionar la imparcialidad de los cargos y el veredicto. Mariscal Strachs, puede comenzar. Liste los delitos contra la Lex Imperialis que examinaremos aquí hoy».

languages.text: 「神帝陛下の御名において、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝は帝国への反逆の罪で告発されています」{n}人々のざわめきの中、総監は帝国行政局の印が押された巻物を手に取った。{/n}「この裁判は公開で行われます。すべての者がローグトレーダーの異端行為を目にし、地位や権力が正しき罰からの盾にはならないことを知るためです。ストラッチス将帥、発言を許可します。ここで審理される{g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}レックス・インペリア{/g}違反の犯罪一覧を述べてください」
languages.original_text: "In the name of the God-Emperor, the von Valancius dynasty stands accused of betraying the Imperium." {n}To the murmurs of all, the prefect picks up a scroll bearing Administratum seals.{/n} "The trial is public so that all may see the Rogue Trader's heresies and know that status and power are no shield against righteous punishment. Marshal Strachs, you have the floor. State the list of crimes against the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g} that will be examined here today."

traits.locale_text: 「神帝陛下の御名において、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝は帝国への反逆の罪で告発されています」{n}人々のざわめきの中、総監は帝国行政局の印が押された巻物を手に取った。{/n}「この裁判は公開で行われます。すべての者がローグトレーダーの異端行為を目にし、地位や権力が正しき罰からの盾にはならないことを知るためです。ストラッチス将帥、発言を許可します。ここで審理される{g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}レックス・インペリア{/g}違反の犯罪一覧を述べてください」

languages.text: "Tanrı İmparator adına von Valancius hanedanlığı, İmparatorluk'aa ihanetle suçlanmaktadır." {n}Fısıltılar arasında prefekt, Administratum mühürleri taşıyan bir tomarı eline alıyor.{/n} "Bu mahkeme, herkesin Hür Tacir'in kâfirliklerini görmesi ve makamla gücün adilce cezalandırılmaya engel olamayacağını bilmesi için halka açık yürütülecektir. Söz sizde Miralay Strachs... {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex İmperialis{/g}'e karşı işlenmiş ve bugün burada yargılayacağımız suçları sıralayınız."
languages.original_text: "In the name of the God-Emperor, the von Valancius dynasty stands accused of betraying the Imperium." {n}To the murmurs of all, the prefect picks up a scroll bearing Administratum seals.{/n} "The trial is public so that all may see the Rogue Trader's heresies and know that status and power are no shield against righteous punishment. Marshal Strachs, you have the floor. State the list of crimes against the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g} that will be examined here today."

traits.locale_text: "Tanrı İmparator adına von Valancius hanedanlığı, İmparatorluk'aa ihanetle suçlanmaktadır." {n}Fısıltılar arasında prefekt, Administratum mühürleri taşıyan bir tomarı eline alıyor.{/n} "Bu mahkeme, herkesin Hür Tacir'in kâfirliklerini görmesi ve makamla gücün adilce cezalandırılmaya engel olamayacağını bilmesi için halka açık yürütülecektir. Söz sizde Miralay Strachs... {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex İmperialis'e{/g} karşı işlenmiş ve bugün burada yargılayacağımız suçları sıralayınız."

"Duruşmamız şimdi, von Valancius hanedanlığının kâfirlik ve İmparatorluk'a ihanetten yargılanacağı davayı görecektir." {n}Herkesin fısıltıları arasında prefekt, Administratum mühürleri taşıyan bir tomarı eline alıyor.{/n} "Bu duruşma, sanığın olağanüstü hâline binaen standart yönetmeliğin dışında yapılacaktır. Verilecek hüküm ve cezaların adaletinden şüpheye mahal kalmaması adına dava, halka açık şekilde yürütülecektir. Söz sizde Miralay Strachs... Lex İmperialis'e karşı işlenmiş ve bugün burada yargılayacağımız suçları sıralayınız."
